description: Ministry of Urban Development, Water Supply and Drainage - Approved the acquisition of servitude over the land in Rambuke Ela and the acquisition of the immovable property in Konakalagala and Vilana in Akurana D/S Division and the acquisition of servitude over the land in Uduwawala, Harispattuwa D/S Division all in Kandy District for the constructions under Kandy North-Pathadumbara Integrated Water Supply Project and the acquisition of land in Ahaspokunawatta, Kundasale D/S Division, Kandy District for the construction under Kundasale-Haragama Water Supply Project
